Class Wheel

  • java.lang.Object
    • Wheel
  • public class Wheel
extends Object
    This class models a Wheel of the Airplane with the required size and pressure. Also checks thta the Wheel is ready to use and

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static double B737_WHEEL_SIZE
      It's a sample wheel size with a value equal to the size of the wheel for a B737
      static String ERROR_HIGHER_PRESSURE
      It's the error message thrown when the pressure is higher than the size
      static String ERROR_LOWER_PRESSURE
      It's the error message thrown when the pressure is less than the MIN_SIZE
      static String ERROR_LOWER_SIZE
      It's the error message thrown when the size is less than the MIN_SIZE
      static double METRIC_WHEEL_SIZE
      It's a sample wheel size with a value equal to the metric size
      static double MIN_SIZE
      It's the minimum size that a wheel can have
      static double SAFETY_THRESHOLD
      It's the minimum safety threshold that a wheel must have to be safe to use
      static double THRESHOLD
      It's the value around is going to be checked the pressure of the wheel

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Wheel()
      Default constructor to create a wheel with a size equal to the METRIC_WHEEL_SIZE and the wheel is full inflated it
      Wheel​(double size)
      Constructor to create a wheel with a given size and it's not inflated it
      Wheel​(double size, double pressure)
      Constructor to create a wheel with a given size and a given pressure

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void activeHardLandingConfiguration()
      Activates the Hard Landing Configuration of the wheel, so the pressure is set to 75% of the wheel size
      double getPressure()
      Returns the value of the pressure of the wheel
      double getSize()
      Returns the value of the size of the wheel
      boolean isOperational()
      Returns if it is safe to use the wheel (the safety ratio of the wheel is higher or equal than the SAFETY_THRESHOLD)
      void print()
      Prints a text with all the values of the size, pressure, the safety ratio and if it's operational
      double reviewPressure​(double basePressure)
      Verifies that the pressure of the wheel is within the range [basePressure-Wheel.THRESHOLD; basePressure+Wheel.THRESHOLD].
      void setPressure​(double pressure)
      Changes the value of the pressure of the wheel
      String toString()
      Returns a text with all the values of the size, pressure, the safety ratio and if it's operational

        clone, equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • reviewPressure

        public double reviewPressure​(double basePressure)
        Verifies that the pressure of the wheel is within the range [basePressure-Wheel.THRESHOLD; basePressure+Wheel.THRESHOLD]. If so, the wheel pressure is correct, and remains unmodified. If don't, the pressure in the wheel will be updated to the basePressure. If the basePressure is negative, the pressure won't update it and a error message will appear
        Parameters:
        basePressure - It's the pressure taken to check if the pressure of the wheel is in that range
        Returns:
        The final pressure of the wheel (it is was correct it remains the same, if not it will be the basePressure)

      • getSize

        public double getSize()
        Returns the value of the size of the wheel
        Returns:
        The value of the size of the wheel

      • setPressure

        public void setPressure​(double pressure)
        Changes the value of the pressure of the wheel
        Parameters:
        pressure - It's the pressure that is going to be set to the wheel

      • getPressure

        public double getPressure()
        Returns the value of the pressure of the wheel
        Returns:
        The value of the pressure of the wheel

      • isOperational

        public boolean isOperational()
        Returns if it is safe to use the wheel (the safety ratio of the wheel is higher or equal than the SAFETY_THRESHOLD)
        Returns:
        True if it's safe.

      • activeHardLandingConfiguration

        public void activeHardLandingConfiguration()
        Activates the Hard Landing Configuration of the wheel, so the pressure is set to 75% of the wheel size

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Returns a text with all the values of the size, pressure, the safety ratio and if it's operational
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
        Returns:
        A text containing all the values of the fields of that wheel

      • print

        public void print()
        Prints a text with all the values of the size, pressure, the safety ratio and if it's operational
